trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event occurs when the user changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> that is selected in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged>事件发生在用户更改时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>中的所选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> named `PropertyGrid1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>名为`PropertyGrid1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The previously selected grid item.
trans-unit.target: 先前选定的网格项。

trans-unit.source: The newly selected grid item.
trans-unit.target: 新选定的网格项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the newly selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取新选定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.target: 获取先前选定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 旧的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是 <see langword="null" />。
